@template unconfirmedaccount
{{div: class=white}}
{{div: class=container why-page}}

@col12

h1. Account validation

We have created your Mothership1 account but we still need proof of your identity.
You are only 1 step away from entering Mothership1!

We will NOT charge your account, neither create a subscription. An authorisation of 1 USD is applied and cancelled right away.

After the validation, we provide free test drive credit so you can try Mothership1 right away!

{{html:
<div ng-controller="AccountValidationController" ng-cloak>


    <a class="btn btn-small margin-top-small border-radius-small padding-all-small" style="border: 1px solid #06a7e2;" ng-click="validateWithPayPal()">
        Validate account by <img src="/$$space/.files/img/payment/paypal_logo.gif" class="padding-horizontal-medium" alt="Validate by PayPal" style="height: 25px;"/>
    </a>


</div>
<script src="/$$space/.files/js/controllers/SignUp/AccountValidationController.js" type="text/javascript"></script>
}}



@divend
@divend
@divend
